function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Interpretation of pedestrian presence as a sign of healthy public space may lead to high population density and increased risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on past data for pedestrian models may lead to inaccurate projections of public space use and potential overcrowding.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digital data collection devices for monitoring public space usage raises legal and ethical concerns regarding privacy and surveillance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social and class differences in the use of public space may lead to unequal exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Skilled workers can shift to online work, while lower income workers may not have this choice, leading to differential exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic and social divisions may be exacerbated by the shift to telecommuting, leading to unequal use of public spaces and segregation based on class, education level, or income.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 challenges the traditional activities of public spaces, such as shopping and socializing, leading to potential changes in behavior and interactions in public areas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drop in pedestrian traffic associated with commercial activity due to covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations on social behavior and informal social interactions in public spaces due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reconfiguration of street activities in cities reliant on tourism due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clusters of people gathering in interior and exterior spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Altered perception of capacity due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of interior spaces due to lockdowns","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for more exterior spaces and improved ventilation due to fears of contagion in closed indoor spaces.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interior spaces heavily regulated by codes and laws that may not align with covid-19 safety recommendations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unlikely radical changes to interior environments over the short term due to heavy regulation and contextual value-laden rules.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enactment of changes to regulations governing interiors to align with social distancing recommendations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of surveillance systems and tracking technology for outbreak control and deconfinement process","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sophisticated tracking methods may lead to invasion of privacy and surveillance concerns.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interactive maps showing infected people’s locations may lead to stigmatization and discrimination.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of location and health data for contact tracing may lead to potential misuse and exploitation of sensitive information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to monitoring and contact-tracing app adoption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crackdown on civil liberties and freedom of assembly","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in mobility patterns due to surveillance and tracking","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced attachment to public places due to prolonged absence during lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in perceptions of public spaces correlated with covid-19 impact, lockdown severity, and economic impact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequities and exclusions in access to public spaces due to pandemic-related restrictions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of existing inequalities and inequities due to covid-19 impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Access to green spaces and public recreational areas disproportionately limited for vulnerable groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of domestic abuse due to lockdowns and stay-at-home orders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undocumented immigrants and racialized minorities may avoid public spaces due to increased control and securitization, leading to further marginalization and isolation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitation of quality public spaces in lower income neighborhoods due to absence of safety and security, controlled by criminal groups.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Militarized and surveillance approaches to ensuring safety in city spaces may deepen patterns of segregation and fragmentation of the city.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Religious minorities may face discrimination in public spaces due to associations between religion, class, and the spread of disease.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High concentration of people in street markets increases the risk of disease transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic recession and loss of income for street vendors may lead to increased vulnerability to illness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large influx of undocumented workers in the informal sector poses a risk to public health and social stability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regulation and data in the informal economy in public spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global interconnected settlement system","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for urban-scale regulations at a global scale","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Covid-19 public health crisis impacting public space design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rethinking public space design to protect and promote planetary health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unprecedented attention to cities and health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to detect and mitigate disruptive events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to prevent or absorb undesired events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of resilience strategies in response to large-scale events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vague definition of resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overlap with existing concepts","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of specific examples","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for multi-hazard threats and incidents, including contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
